name: Wanderlust: The Bermuda Secret
summary: After your flight takes you into an ominous cloud bank, you soon find yourself hidden within the eye of a permanent storm at the center of the Bermuda Triangle, with no connection to the rest of the world, no supplies, and no hope of escape from a strange island! This point and click, puzzle adventure tasks players with finding a list of objects hidden, to uncover the truth of the island.
